sub_topic: Finding the area of a parallelogram.
message_1: A parallelogram has a base of 6 centimeters and a height of 8 centimeters. What is the area of the parallelogram in square centimeters?
message_2:
The area of a parallelogram can be calculated using the formula: Area = base × height. In this case, the base is 6 centimeters and the height is 8 centimeters.

Area = 6 cm × 8 cm = 48 square centimeters

The area of the parallelogram is 48 square centimeters.
